name: Chain of Responsibility
description: Implement request handling with chain of responsibility. Handlers: 'auth' (rejects if user='guest'), 'rate_limit' (rejects if requests>100), 'validation' (rejects if data empty), 'process' (returns 'success'). Given [user, requests, data], return the result or which handler rejected.
hints: Create a chain where each handler either processes or passes to the next. The chain of responsibility decouples sender from receivers by giving multiple objects a chance to handle the request.
